title: WebAppDemo
description: A simple web application demonstration to showcase my ability with ASP.Net MVC (with authentication and appropriate routing), React, Data Access (performed with Dapper), Database Management (normalisation of fields etc.) within SQLite3, and more.

title: ShopAppy Social Media Solution Prototype
description: A prototype solution was created to allow sellers to connect their social media accounts, allowing the software to create posts for them. This made use of natural language processing and sentiment analysis with existing social media posts, and event triggers related to special occasions or new products for sale.
